GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves up an object of the requested article

article.title: Running a Node App
article.author: jessjelly
article.article_img_url: A url leading to an image

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves up an array of comments posted to the requested article

comments.created_at: String of date and time created
comments.author: user7

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment into the comments table, responds with an object of the new comment

exampleResponse.author: butter_bridge
exampleResponse.created_at: String of date and time of post creation

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the specified comment and responds only with a 204 status code

GET /api/users.description: serves up an array of all users

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: changes the votes of the selected comment, using an object on inc_votes

POST /api/articles.description: adds an article to the articles table, and returns the new article
